text: Heberdenia excelsa is a species of plant in the family Primulaceae. It is found in the Macaronesian archipelagoes, the Canary Islands, Azores, and Madeira, governed by Portugal and Spain. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== Category:Primulaceae Category:Flora of Madeira Category:Flora of the Canary Islands Category:Flora of the Azores Category:Trees of Mediterranean climate Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Heberdenia excelsa
